articles.description: Tejashwi Yadav's comments on his marriage to Rachel Godinho, made in an interview to NDTV have gone viral. "I told my father 'I'm dating this girl and would love to marry her. But she's a Christian'. My dad was like, 'It's OK. No problem'," he said.
